review.reviewBody:
Best pizza in the town .. always love the taste.. highly recommend 
Must order Large Veggie with Sweet Corn Pizza best of all

Best ever service i received,
Thank you pizza 80
breadsticks were no good  but pizza was good

The pasta was fine but the portion size is sooo bad. they use the large size rectangle containers and only fill it half way..... My question is why not use the round circular tins instead and fill it a little bit higher? better for presentation!
